â€‹James is an econometrician turned progressive campaigner. He is equally passionate about communicating political values, organizing campaigns, and running field experiments. Before joining BlueLabs, James worked for the Australian Labor Party. He was most recently an adviser in the Office of the Premier of South Australia.

James has honors degrees in law and economics from the Australian National University. Outside of work, he is usually found brewing coffee and trying to learn the rules of baseball and football. He patiently awaits his call-up as opening batsman and captain of the Australian cricket team.
